Author: sarosh
Content: It depends on the state of incorporation; depending on where you incorporated and that laws of the state with respect to minority shareholders, there may be a legal process known as "an accounting" under which shareholders must divulge specific information or face court order. Does your company have bylaws? If so, then some of the disclosures may be controlled by those provisions. Of course, the best advice on this topic is from an attorney....but failing that, check out the Delaware BCL (Delaware's Business Corporation law)...

Author: mhidalgo
Content: This method works for larger companies with lots of data.  As a startup I find it hard to see this being implemented.

Author: amichail
Title: Are there any copyright issues with embedded YouTube videos?
Content:
From what I understand, linking to a site that may have copyright violations is not illegal.

But what about embedding a YouTube video that is a copyright violation? Is that legal?
